title: Camera won't show previously taken images on Camera Roll
content:
Hello,

When I try to view my camera roll via the Camera app, the images won't come up. I tap on the little circle, the last image I took flashes on the screen for a split second, and then closes.

I've tried wiping the app storage with no joy. I've tried moving all previously taken images out of the DCIM folder and taking a new images, same issue. If I uninstall all the updates from the app, it works as expected.

Any suggestions would be appreciated. 

(Pixel 2 XL)
